title.narrative: Increase capacity and resilience of poor people Nutrition Central And Provincial Responses.

description.narrative: HKI: increasing the supply of high quality, affordable fortified food products and increasing consumer awareness/demand for these products, thus reducing morbidity and mortality in the Mozambican population, especially among women of reproductive age and children. SETSAN: SETSAN has been engaged in the strengthening coordinating mechanisms at national and sub-national level to enable in-country stakeholders to better work for improved nutrition outcomes and provide technical support to the provinces of Inhambane and NIassa.CIP: Making OFSP universally available as a source of nutrition, food security, and income in the two provinces

Nutrition C.& Prov.Responses-HKI,CIP & SETSAN, HKI: strengthen the National Food Fortification Programme by supporting the fortification of vegetable oil (vitamin A) and wheat flour (iron, folic acid, B-complex vitamins, and zinc) SETSAN: support SETSAN in the roll out of SUN movement by implementing the Multi-sectorial Plan for Reduction of Chronic Malnutrition (PAMRDC).International Potato centre (CIP) : OFSP production/agronomy; nutrition; OFSP marketing; and capacity building.
